newsData.title: New Tariff on ‘Transshipped’ Goods Mystifies Importers
newsData.summary: The Trump administration levied a hefty tariff on goods that are moved through other countries, but it has not yet fully explained its plans.

newsData.title: ‘A Loyalist Inside the Building’: Trump’s Temporary Fed Pick Could Have a Lasting Effect
newsData.summary: Stephen I. Miran may spend only a few months on the central bank’s board of governors, but in that time he can influence the discussions around interest rates and who will become the institution’s next leader.

newsData.title: Some safe-haven assets have soared against the U.S. dollar.
newsData.summary: This was featured in live coverage.

newsData.title: Swiss Businesses Fear Being ‘Annihilated’ by One of the World’s Highest Tariffs
newsData.summary: Goods shipped from the country face a 39 percent tariff in the U.S., which companies warn will have dire consequences if President Trump cannot be quickly dissuaded.

newsData.title: Here’s What Could Get More Expensive Under Trump’s Tariffs
newsData.summary: The tariffs are driving up prices on everyday goods as businesses warn they can no longer absorb costs, leaving consumers to foot the bill.
